getBapiResult

public java.lang.String getBapiResult(SAPConnector sap, java.lang.String bapi, java.util.ArrayList importParameter, java.lang.String exportStructure, java.lang.String exportValue)
This function calculates the result of a specified Bapi
param:
sap Connection Object to SAP from SAPController
param:
bapi Name of the BAPI to be calculated
param:
importParameter List of Parameters for the BAPI with name and value
param:
exportStructure Name of the Structure to be calculated
param:
exportValue name of the value field within the exportStructure to be calculated
